---
title: "Luke's Blog"
description: "Lukas Mayer's personal blog - tech tips, life-style recommendations, software development, research, data science"
listing:
  id: main-listing
  type: grid
  grid-columns: 3
  fields: [image, date, title, description, reading-time]
  contents: posts
  sort: "date desc"
  sort-ui: [title, date]
  filter-ui: [title, date]
  categories: true
  feed: true
  page-size: 6
format: 
  html:
    toc: false
---

<div class="quarto-content hidden">
</div>

<style>
.description {
    display: none;
}

@keyframes rainbowText {
    0% {
        color: #FF0000; /* Bright red */
    }
    16% {
        color: #FFA500; /* Bright orange */
    }
    33% {
        color: #FFFF00; /* Bright yellow */
    }
    50% {
        color: #00FF00; /* Bright green */
    }
    66% {
        color: #00BFFF; /* Bright blue */
    }
    83% {
        color: #FF00FF; /* Magenta */
    }
    100% {
        color: #FF0000; /* Return to bright red for looping */
    }
}


.rainbow-animation {
    animation: rainbowText 10s infinite;
    display: inline-block; /* Ensure icon and text are treated together */
}

.rainbow-animation i {
    animation: rainbowText 10s infinite; /* Apply the animation to the icon */
}
</style>




<script>
  window.addEventListener("load", function() {
    var content = document.querySelector(".quarto-content");
    if (content) {
      content.classList.remove("hidden");  // Remove the hidden class to allow transition
      content.classList.add("fade-in");    // Add the fade-in class for the transition effect
    }
  });
</script>
